scripts.say: As expected: Gneisenau was too much for me to handle... But on the other hand, I endured my injuries long enough for everyone to retreat. I've lived up to my name... More importantly: Ardent, Acasta, please return to the transport ships! Don't forget your mission!
But we can't just leave you here! You'll...!
I will be fine. I'm tougher than I look!
(It's true, I am... But if I'm forced into yet another battle, it may be my last...)
